rules_text:
Mentor [i](Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)[/i]
[i]Sesar's Ancestor[/i] – You may skip your draw step. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn.
[i]Passionate Teacher[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the mana value of that spell.
